title: Atikur0011
author: Atikur0011
content: How do I post pictures to this forum?​

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: Quote from: Atikur0011 on November 29, 2023, 03:55:38 AMHow do I post pictures to this forum?​First of all you need to be a at least Jr. Member and buy a copper membership for posting image on this forum.Then select a image host website(ex : talkimg.com ) then upload your images copy the link of that image and post here with image tag.You can also follow this topic for complete guideline Guideline on posting images (with size adjustments), hyperlinks

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Your account rank is Newbie, which prohibits you from posting images. You would either need to buy Copper membership or would need to become a Jr. Member getting 1 Merits from others in the community. You can read this thread for more information - Merits & new rank requirements. Do remember buying merits is an offence and can result in permanent ban.

comments.author: Churchillvv
comments.body: Like crypto library have said you might be interested to check out this post by theymos to know more about image posting. Image post disabled for newbies - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1172918.0Newbies can now pay a small fee to enable images - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2385104.0

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Newbie rank have restrictions and one of it is being unable to post irnages but there is a way to remove that restriction. There are two ways to remove the restriction. First is to make your rank increase or rank up to Jr. member which requires 1 merit and 30 activity points. Second is by buying copper membership and to buy copper membership is to go here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promote and you have to pay for it in BTC. After buying copper membership then you can now equip it on your account. Hope that helps. You should also read about forum rules, merits, forum badges, coins and activity points because it is important in your journey here in the forum and in crypto space.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.created_time: November 29, 2023, 04:41:42 AMLast edit: November 29, 2023, 05:04:22 AM by Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: Atikur0011 on November 29, 2023, 03:55:38 AMHow do I post pictures to this forum?​Just as other members had already mentioned, you have to be at least junior member or cooper member to be able to post images on BitcoinTalk. But nevertheless, if you have a post  that contains an image you might want to share for further understanding, then you can upload your image on Talkimg.com( Bitcoitalk image hosting site),  then copy and  drop the image link along side your post. A member may be willing to help your repost the image or you can request for a member to assist you.Edit: gave op 1 merit to enable him rank up to a junior member and be able to post images. Op, you can now post images with your new rank. Just upload them to talkimg.com, copy and paste the BBCODE full link. Lastly, you might consider locking this thread since you might have gotten enough replies for your question, to avoid repeated or spamming replies.

comments.author: petulino
comments.body: Quote from: Atikur0011 on November 29, 2023, 03:55:38 AMHow do I post pictures to this forum?Here is a guide explaining how to post a picture to BitcoinTalk. I hope this is useful.put your picture online There are several options accessible. Upload your photo using one of the image hosting sites like Imgur, Tinypic, or another.Obtain the URL for the picture. After your picture has been uploaded, copy the direct URL link.Include this image in your article. Use the format [img] to show the image in your Bitcointalk post.Here is Your Image URL in jpeg format.You should substitute "Your_Image_URL_Here" with the actual URL that you copied.And that's it! Your image should now be shown in your post. Ensure that you use reliable photo hosting services and follow the image-related guidelines on the forum.
